name: Lost In Space (itch) (RoJoJoey)
description:
LostInSpace is a tech demo for a rope-based platformer.

The game currently only has one level; a tutorial. More will be added in the future.

To-do:
- Fix jittering when moving
- Fix rope color and width
- Add more levels
- (maybe) add sound
- Add scale settings so game can be played on different resolutions

Run the game in 1920x1080 resolution.

Controls:

Movement: WASD
Jump: space
Create rope: Left click
Destroy rope: Right click

Assets used: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/environments/warped-city-assets-pack-13...
